alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Aransas, central Calhoun, south central Victoria, southeastern Goliad and Refugio Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Quintana to 6 miles south of Tivoli to near Matagorda Island State Park. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockport, Refugio, Seadrift, Lamar, Quintana, Holiday Beach, Tivoli, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Matagorda Island State Park, Copano Village, Fulton and Austwell. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 666 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 600 and 622. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
